text:
@realDonaldTrump @nytimes SOUNDS LIKE you're back to your same tweet QUACKERY criticize/critique the news, media or reporters.

Still campaigning on twitter day & nite.

COVID-19 self quarantine didn't start MONTHS AGO, unless you knew months ago!

"haven’t left the White House in many months"
